allowas-in-enable.name: allowas-in-enable
allowas-in-enable.help: Enable/disable IPv4 Enable to allow my AS in AS path.

allowas-in-enable6.name: allowas-in-enable6
allowas-in-enable6.help: Enable/disable IPv6 Enable to allow my AS in AS path.

allowas-in.name: allowas-in
allowas-in.help: IPv4 The maximum number of occurrence of my AS number allowed.

allowas-in6.name: allowas-in6
allowas-in6.help: IPv6 The maximum number of occurrence of my AS number allowed.

attribute-unchanged.name: attribute-unchanged
attribute-unchanged.help: IPv4 List of attributes that should be unchanged.

attribute-unchanged6.name: attribute-unchanged6
attribute-unchanged6.help: IPv6 List of attributes that should be unchanged.

activate.name: activate
activate.help: Enable/disable address family IPv4 for this neighbor.

activate6.name: activate6
activate6.help: Enable/disable address family IPv6 for this neighbor.

capability-dynamic.name: capability-dynamic
capability-dynamic.help: Enable/disable advertise dynamic capability to this neighbor.

capability-orf.name: capability-orf
capability-orf.help: Accept/Send IPv4 ORF lists to/from this neighbor.

capability-orf6.name: capability-orf6
capability-orf6.help: Accept/Send IPv6 ORF lists to/from this neighbor.

capability-graceful-restart.name: capability-graceful-restart
capability-graceful-restart.help: Enable/disable advertise IPv4 graceful restart capability to this neighbor.

capability-graceful-restart6.name: capability-graceful-restart6
capability-graceful-restart6.help: Enable/disable advertise IPv6 graceful restart capability to this neighbor.

capability-route-refresh.name: capability-route-refresh
capability-route-refresh.help: Enable/disable advertise route refresh capability to this neighbor.

capability-default-originate.name: capability-default-originate
capability-default-originate.help: Enable/disable advertise default IPv4 route to this neighbor.

capability-default-originate6.name: capability-default-originate6
capability-default-originate6.help: Enable/disable advertise default IPv6 route to this neighbor.

dont-capability-negotiate.name: dont-capability-negotiate
dont-capability-negotiate.help: Don't negotiate capabilities with this neighbor

stale-route.name: stale-route
stale-route.help: Enable/disable stale route after neighbor down.

next-hop-self.name: next-hop-self
next-hop-self.help: Enable/disable IPv4 next-hop calculation for this neighbor.

next-hop-self6.name: next-hop-self6
next-hop-self6.help: Enable/disable IPv6 next-hop calculation for this neighbor.

next-hop-self-rr.name: next-hop-self-rr
next-hop-self-rr.help: Enable/disable setting nexthop's address to interface's IPv4 address for route-reflector routes.

next-hop-self-rr6.name: next-hop-self-rr6
next-hop-self-rr6.help: Enable/disable setting nexthop's address to interface's IPv6 address for route-reflector routes.

override-capability.name: override-capability
override-capability.help: Enable/disable override result of capability negotiation.

passive.name: passive
passive.help: Enable/disable sending of open messages to this neighbor.

remove-private-as.name: remove-private-as
remove-private-as.help: Enable/disable remove private AS number from IPv4 outbound updates.

remove-private-as6.name: remove-private-as6
remove-private-as6.help: Enable/disable remove private AS number from IPv6 outbound updates.

route-reflector-client.name: route-reflector-client
route-reflector-client.help: Enable/disable IPv4 AS route reflector client.

route-reflector-client6.name: route-reflector-client6
route-reflector-client6.help: Enable/disable IPv6 AS route reflector client.

route-server-client.name: route-server-client
route-server-client.help: Enable/disable IPv4 AS route server client.

route-server-client6.name: route-server-client6
route-server-client6.help: Enable/disable IPv6 AS route server client.

soft-reconfiguration.name: soft-reconfiguration
soft-reconfiguration.help: Enable/disable allow IPv4 inbound soft reconfiguration.

soft-reconfiguration6.name: soft-reconfiguration6
soft-reconfiguration6.help: Enable/disable allow IPv6 inbound soft reconfiguration.

as-override.name: as-override
as-override.help: Enable/disable replace peer AS with own AS for IPv4.

as-override6.name: as-override6
as-override6.help: Enable/disable replace peer AS with own AS for IPv6.

default-originate-routemap.name: default-originate-routemap
default-originate-routemap.help: Route map to specify criteria to originate IPv4 default.

default-originate-routemap6.name: default-originate-routemap6
default-originate-routemap6.help: Route map to specify criteria to originate IPv6 default.

distribute-list-in.name: distribute-list-in
distribute-list-in.help: Filter for IPv4 updates from this neighbor.

distribute-list-in6.name: distribute-list-in6
distribute-list-in6.help: Filter for IPv6 updates from this neighbor.

distribute-list-out.name: distribute-list-out
distribute-list-out.help: Filter for IPv4 updates to this neighbor.

distribute-list-out6.name: distribute-list-out6
distribute-list-out6.help: Filter for IPv6 updates to this neighbor.

ebgp-multihop-ttl.name: ebgp-multihop-ttl
ebgp-multihop-ttl.help: EBGP multihop TTL for this peer.

filter-list-in.name: filter-list-in
filter-list-in.help: BGP filter for IPv4 inbound routes.

filter-list-in6.name: filter-list-in6
filter-list-in6.help: BGP filter for IPv6 inbound routes.

filter-list-out.name: filter-list-out
filter-list-out.help: BGP filter for IPv4 outbound routes.

filter-list-out6.name: filter-list-out6
filter-list-out6.help: BGP filter for IPv6 outbound routes.

interface.name: interface
interface.help: Specify outgoing interface for peer connection. For IPv6 peer, the interface should have link-local address.

maximum-prefix.name: maximum-prefix
maximum-prefix.help: Maximum number of IPv4 prefixes to accept from this peer.

maximum-prefix6.name: maximum-prefix6
maximum-prefix6.help: Maximum number of IPv6 prefixes to accept from this peer.

maximum-prefix-threshold.name: maximum-prefix-threshold
maximum-prefix-threshold.help: Maximum IPv4 prefix threshold value (1 - 100 percent).

maximum-prefix-threshold6.name: maximum-prefix-threshold6
maximum-prefix-threshold6.help: Maximum IPv6 prefix threshold value (1 - 100 percent).

maximum-prefix-warning-only.name: maximum-prefix-warning-only
maximum-prefix-warning-only.help: Enable/disable IPv4 Only give warning message when limit is exceeded.

maximum-prefix-warning-only6.name: maximum-prefix-warning-only6
maximum-prefix-warning-only6.help: Enable/disable IPv6 Only give warning message when limit is exceeded.

prefix-list-in.name: prefix-list-in
prefix-list-in.help: IPv4 Inbound filter for updates from this neighbor.

prefix-list-in6.name: prefix-list-in6
prefix-list-in6.help: IPv6 Inbound filter for updates from this neighbor.

prefix-list-out.name: prefix-list-out
prefix-list-out.help: IPv4 Outbound filter for updates to this neighbor.

prefix-list-out6.name: prefix-list-out6
prefix-list-out6.help: IPv6 Outbound filter for updates to this neighbor.

local-as-no-prepend.name: local-as-no-prepend
local-as-no-prepend.help: Do not prepend local-as to incoming updates.

local-as-replace-as.name: local-as-replace-as
local-as-replace-as.help: Replace real AS with local-as in outgoing updates.

route-map-out-preferable.name: route-map-out-preferable
route-map-out-preferable.help: IPv4 outbound route map filter if the peer is preferred.

route-map-out6-preferable.name: route-map-out6-preferable
route-map-out6-preferable.help: IPv6 outbound route map filter if the peer is preferred.

send-community.name: send-community
send-community.help: IPv4 Send community attribute to neighbor.

send-community6.name: send-community6
send-community6.help: IPv6 Send community attribute to neighbor.

unsuppress-map.name: unsuppress-map
unsuppress-map.help: IPv4 Route map to selectively unsuppress suppressed routes.

unsuppress-map6.name: unsuppress-map6
unsuppress-map6.help: IPv6 Route map to selectively unsuppress suppressed routes.

update-source.name: update-source
update-source.help: Interface to use as source IP/IPv6 address of TCP connections.

restart-time.name: restart-time
restart-time.help: Graceful restart delay time (sec, 0 = global default).

options.name: both
options.help: Enable sending and receiving additional paths.

options.name: both
options.help: Enable sending and receiving additional paths.

adv-additional-path.name: adv-additional-path
adv-additional-path.help: Number of IPv4 additional paths that can be advertised to this neighbor.

adv-additional-path6.name: adv-additional-path6
adv-additional-path6.help: Number of IPv6 additional paths that can be advertised to this neighbor.

options.name: exist
options.help: True if condition route map is matched.

options.name: non-exist
options.help: True if condition route map is not matched.

options.name: exist
options.help: True if condition route map is matched.

options.name: non-exist
options.help: True if condition route map is not matched.
